entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Coronation
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:34 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coronation 11:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: -11.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: W 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 8:32 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:32 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 8:32 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
